mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, notice_no, notice_title, user_id, notice_content, notice_date, notice_count FROM (select * from notice order by notice_no desc)) where rnum >= #{startRow} and rnum <= #{endRow}
mapper.insert: insert into notice (notice_no, user_id, notice_title, notice_content, notice_date, notice_count) values ((select max(notice_no) + 1 from notice), #{ user_id }, #{ notice_title }, #{notice_content}, sysdate, #{notice_count})
mapper.select: select * from notice where notice_no = #{ notice_no }
mapper.delete: delete from notice where notice_no = #{ notice_no }
mapper.select: select * from notice where notice_title like '%' || #{ keyword } || '%' order by notice_no desc
